# Variables environnementales

Il n'y a pas de effets significatifs entre le taux de croissance et les variables environnementales testé dans le papier de *de Moura Neves 2015* (i.e. depth, latitude, temperature, chlorophyll a, surface particulate organic carbon and surface particulate inorganic carbon).

depth, temperature and food input are generally recognised as important factors influencing growth (Roberts et al., 2009).

Temperature, surface primary productivity, salinity and calcite saturation have been predicted to be some of the most influential environmental factors in determining the distribution of cold-water sea pens (Yesson et al., 2012)

 Greathead et al. (2015) found that mud, minimum salinity, depth and gravel were important variables influencing the presence of three sea pen species in Scottish waters.

Je n'ai pris aucune données de surface, seulement des données de fond.
